<small>Also see: [[H5432]]</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְאָה‎</span> **noun feminine** (see ***below***) ==se'ah==, a measure of flour, grain, etc. (√ unknown; perhaps foreign word; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְאָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָאתָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σάτον</span>, [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdwörter 116 f</sup>)); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְאָהֿ‎</span> [[2Kgs.7.1|2Kgs 7:1]]; [[2Kgs.7.16|2Kgs 7:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּסֳאָהֿ‎</span> v[[2Kgs.7.18|2Kgs 7:18]] ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]] compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:10h»§ 10h</sup>); dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָאתַיִם‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.32|1Kgs 18:32]] + 3 t.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סְאִים‎</span> [[Gen.18.6|Gen 18:6]]; [[1Sam.25.18|1Sam 25:18]] — always with appositive of thing measured, [[Gen.18.6|Gen 18:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.25.18|1Sam 25:18]]; [[1Kgs.18.32|1Kgs 18:32]]; [[2Kgs.7.1|2Kgs 7:1]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.7.16|2Kgs 7:16]] (twice in verse); [[2Kgs.7.18|2Kgs 7:18]] (twice in verse) (where apparently masculine, perhaps after analogy of other measures of capacity, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִין‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹמֶר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּר‎</span>, etc., [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xvi (1896), 95</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַאסְּאָה‎</span> [[Isa.27.8|Isa 27:8]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סאסא‎</span>. — On size of se'ah = 1/3 ephah, = 12.148 ***litres*** (= 10.696 qts.), see [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology i. 203</sup> [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]<sup>Archaeology 183</sup>.
